block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: The Pinwheel Cube by Tomoko Fuse is a really easy modular origami model. Learn how to fold it with this tutorial. To fold the Pinwheel Cube you will need 6 piece of square paper for each face of the cube. 0:00 Model Name and Designer 0:08 How to Fold the Module 2:25 Completed Module 2:40 Model Assembly 4:27 Completed model Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

block_list.title: More Designs from Tomoko Fuse
block_list.body:
• Octagonal Box (Lid and Base) by Tomoko Fuse
  • Pinwheel Cube by Tomoko Fuse
